content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Crude Oil Extraction Structure at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of 
- Pumpjack at position (17.5, 40.5)
- Storage tank at position (22.5, 42.5)
- PipeGroup at position (19.5, 38.5) that connects pumpjack to storage tank

### Electricity Generator at position(-2.5, 21.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 21.5)
- Boiler at position (-8.0, 21.5)
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 21.5)
- PipeGroup at position (-11.5, 22.5) that connects offshore pump to boiler
- PipeGroup at position (-6.5, 21.5) that connects boiler to steam engine
- ElectricityGroup that connects steam engine to pumpjack

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target location is buildable and not occupied by another entity or water before attempting to place an entity. 
- Verify that the entity is defined before using it.

### Errors when inspecting entity inventory
- Check if the entity's inventory is accessible before attempting to inspect it.

### Errors when entities are not functioning
- Ensure that entities that require fuel have sufficient fuel.
- Ensure that entities that require power have a valid power connection.

### Errors when boiler runs out of fuel
- Monitor boiler fuel levels and add coal when necessary to prevent it from running out of fuel.

## NAMESPACE
### Important Variables
- `pumpjack_box`: entities.BuildingBox
- `PumpJack`: pydantic._internal._model_construction.ModelMetaclass
- `storage_tank`: Entity (StorageTank)

### Utility Functions
No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the given logs.
